name: Jobs to be Done (JTBD) Worksheet
description:
Jobs to be Done is a framework based on a theory called “Jobs” coined together by Clayton M. Christensen in his book - Competing Against Luck: The Story of Innovation and Customer Choice. The jobs theory is based on the notion that people buy products and services to get a “job” done. By understanding in detail what that “job” is, companies are far more likely to create and market solutions that will win in the marketplace.

Source: The Fundamentals of Jobs to be Done Theory


When to use this template? - When you and your team need to drill down to the core job you want to accomplish, as well as the steps you’ll take to accomplish it.
